reviews.review_msg: I often wonder if teachers actually read the surveys they make us take or if they just do them to make us feel heard. I literally asked for the 3hr final exam on a weekday to be changed to a 3-day take home (during a weekend)... AND SHE DID IT! I think teachers had some options because of COVID but I didn't think she would make it open book & 3day!
Very harsh marking rubric. Lectures are messy and material is dense. A lot of reading. Avoid.

Jodie is a great prof! Her lectures are sometimes boring as she reads off the slides but its smart to take notes on top of the notes to help you get a better understanding of the material. This class was pretty interesting, don't let the science part scare you... its all memorization. If Jodie herself marks then you're good to go! Great prof!

Jodie is one of my favourite profs at SFU. I've taken two of her classes and would definitely take another in the future. She's very knowledgeable and quite funny. Very pleasant to be around. I wish her the best on her future endeavours!

I took this class online. Both her exams are all short written questions. Make sure you stay on top of the readings if you want to do well. Good thing is you kinda bs on the exams if you somewhat know the general ideas.

very helpful exams not so easy. The midterm was brutal even though she gave us study questions. She made the final easier based on everyones average on the midterm. Final much easier. Overall very nice helpful and wants her students to do well. I would take her again.
Interesting course, Jodie was fair and helpful, exams were certainly not easy, but not difficult either. Involves a great deal of memorization.
Jodie is a great teacher. She is truly kind and cares about how you do in the class. I am so happy to be taking a second course with her this semester.

The class is 100% textbook based and additional journal articles, there are no lectures for her to give online so really she's only marking exams (with the TM). And the TM was the one to email questions to as well. Seems nice, if you find the content interesting you will do well. Mainly midterm and final though.
Suzanna is awesome, she really knows her stuff and communicates very clearly and effectively. Would totally recommend!

Stay clear of this class. The midterm and final are worth a huge chunk of your grades and they are really hard. You have to study very specific details and a lot of important concepts that we had to study was not even on the exams. This was a total disappointment
The exam's for this course are HARSH. Very specific information and they are 100 point exams. Get ready to fail.

She is kinda hot for someone with kids. Assignments are easy and exams are decent. Only beef is that during exams, sometimes she talks loudly to students, cracks jokes and basically acts unprofessional.
prof???? she wishes...thinks shes a prof but doesnt have a hope. full of herself.
This prof wants you to work hard, but is willing to help you if you are willing to help yourself.

Easy class, easy marker.  At times she did not really know what she was talking about, again only knowledgeable in her own research area. Easy exams, short answer straight from notes.  not a challenging course!!
